Text:
This program (and merinamar's other 2 uploads) are infected by the DevilRobber trojan, see: http://blog.intego.com/new-malware-devilrobber-grabs-files-and-bitcoins-performs-bitcoin-mining-and-more/.
If you are infected delete: Users/yourlogon/Library/LaunchAgents/com.apple.legion.plist and the folder Users/yourlogon/Library/mdsa1331/
